title: Crash when trying to patch client?

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: This happens every time when I try to Patch the client please help me.

replies.body: This kernel error usually indicates a security setting or something that's blocking your patcher from opening.  Go over the steps found in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore that access.  Let me know if you have any questions!
